Summary: Bright yellow-orange disc hovered above for about 2 min..
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Oxnard
There were no other sightings in Oxnard on or around May 30th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from late show at movies at 11:35 p.m. suddenly caught sight of bright lights though passenger side front window. At first thought it was reflection of street lamps, but it quickly became apparent it wasn't. I pulled over and asked my wife to verify what I was seeing. My wife, I and our 3 kids all got out of the car to observe what was clearly a bright yellow translucent disc hovering above and moving slowly across the sky. It moved smoothly with a glowing halo around it. It was incredibly bright. I excitedly tried to take the photo with a digital SLR but it was not able to adjust the aperature quickly enough so I got a shot with my camera phone (attached). My daughter also caught a picture with her cell phone. While I have always been open-minded to the possiblity of alien visitations, I have always maintained a healthy degree of skepticism. However, in this case, I truly am convinced that this was an object encounter not of this world. My wife and kids were also impressed.
